div.p: On Thursday, April 9, Governor Tom Wolf ordered all Pennsylvania schools closed for the remainder of the academic school year.
Beginning Monday, April 6, Governor Mifflin School District will provide online planned learning for students in Grades K-12. Please access our At Home Learning website by clicking the button below:

Beginning Tuesday, March 16 and continuing weekdays through the shutdown, the Governor Mifflin Food Service staff will be serving free grab-and-go breakfast and lunch to all children ages 18 and younger. Walk-up/drive-up service will be provided Monday-Friday:

li.a: Berks County Department of Emergency Services COVID-19 Information

CDC Checklist for teachers, parents, and administrators
Download a Mustang Nation Hand Washing poster

div.p: Updates and alerts regarding the coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) will be sent using the Skylert communication system. Families should log in to your Skyward account and click the “Skylert” tab to ensure your contact information is up-to-date. For step-by-step directions, please click here.

h4.a: 3/23: Governor extends school closure for additional 2 weeks
